item.name: Potion of Healing
entries: You regain hit points when you drink this potion. The number of hit points depends on the potion's rarity.

item.name: Bag of Holding
entries: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions.

item.name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
entries: While wearing this belt, you gain the following benefits:

items: Your Constitution score increases by 2, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks made to interact with dwarves.
You can speak and understand Dwarvish.
You can use an action to cast the {@spell speak with animals} spell, but only to speak with and understand subterranean beasts. The spell lasts for 1 hour or until you use this property again.

item.name: Ring of Invisibility
entries: This ring is crafted from a thin band of cold metal, usually silver, and is always slightly cool to the touch.

While wearing this ring, you can turn {@condition invisible} as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} with you. You remain {@condition invisible} until the ring is removed, until you attack or cast a spell, or until you use a bonus action to become visible again.

item.name: Staff of Power
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.
While holding it, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls.

The staff has 20 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell cone of cold} (5 charges), {@spell fireball} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell globe of invulnerability} (6 charges), {@spell hold monster} (5 charges), {@spell levitate} (2 charges), {@spell lightning bolt} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell magic missile} (1 charge), {@spell ray of enfeeblement} (1 charge), or {@spell wall of force} (5 charges).
The staff regains {@dice 2d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff loses its properties and becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

item.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
entries: This cloak is made of a thin, shimmering gray fabric that seems to absorb light.
While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide.

item.name: Wand of Fireballs
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell fireball} spell (save DC 15) from it.
For {@dice 1 charge}, you cast the {@dice 3rd-level} version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Amulet of Health
entries: Your Constitution score is 19 while you wear this amulet. It has no effect on you if your Constitution is already 19 or higher.
